Combination/ Merge¶

Includes csv reading, loading and meaningful combination.

data.combination.aggregate_dd(df: DataFrame) → DataFrame¶

Returns dataframe aggregated by “Name” column.

data.combination.aggregate_hd(df: DataFrame) → DataFrame¶

Returns dataframe aggregated by “Name” column.

data.combination.convert_df(df: DataFrame, type: str) → DataFrame¶

Converts values to numeric values.

To be able to summarize the data, all values need to be converted to numeric first. The “Amount” column has 3 values separated by special characters, 2 of which get split into their own columns.

Parameters:

  • dd_df – Pandas dataframe that has just been concatenated.

  • type – Either “HPS” or “DPS” - both have slightly different columns and thus need to be handled differently.

Returns:

Dataframe where all relevant values have been converted to numeric (except “Name” column).

data.combination.csv_to_dfs() → tuple[list[pandas.core.frame.DataFrame], list[pandas.core.frame.DataFrame]]¶

Reads csv files.

Reads csv files in csv directory as pandas dataframes and adds them either to a “damage”, or to a “healing” list, depending on their structure.

Returns:

2-tuple of lists of dataframes, one for damage and one for healing.

data.combination.fix_columns_dd(df: DataFrame) → DataFrame¶

Fixes and sets better looking column names for later visualization.

data.combination.fix_columns_hd(df: DataFrame) → DataFrame¶

Fixes and sets better looking column names for later visualization.

data.combination.get_csv_paths() → list[str]¶

Returns a list of relative paths to csv files in the csv directory.

data.combination.join_dd_dfs(dd_df_list: list[pandas.core.frame.DataFrame]) → DataFrame¶

Joins multiple “damage done” dataframes to single dataframe.

Concatenates all dataframes provided into one dataframe, converts all values (except for column “Name”) into numeric values, reorders and renames columns.

Parameters:

dd_df_list – A list of pandas dataframes with identical structure and data referring to the “damage done” metric.

Returns:

The returned pd.DataFrame is the summary of the given dataframes, ready to be visualized.

data.combination.join_hd_dfs(hd_df_list: list[pandas.core.frame.DataFrame]) → DataFrame¶

Joins multiple “healing done” dataframes to single dataframe.

Mostly identical to join_dd_dfs(), split up into two functions because the structure of the given dataframes are slightly different in both cases.

Parameters:

dd_df_list – A list of pandas dataframes with identical structure and data referring to the “healing done” metric.

Returns:

The returned pd.DataFrame is the summary of the given dataframes, ready to be visualized.
